title: NPR News: 'Don't Look Back': Graduates Who Pursued College When Hurricane Maria Hit
content: 'Don't Look Back': Graduates Who Pursued College When Hurricane Maria Hit  After Hurricane Maria, some college students left Puerto Rico to enroll on the mainland. For one young woman, her graduation after a difficult year felt like a triumph.  Read more on NPR
contentWithMarkup:
'Don't Look Back': Graduates Who Pursued College When Hurricane Maria Hit
After Hurricane Maria, some college students left Puerto Rico to enroll on the mainland. For one young woman, her graduation after a difficult year felt like a triumph.

Read more on NPR

feed.name: Citizen Shame
feed.description: I think I did pretty well under the circumstances.
